qas.question: How many universities are in Switzerland?
How many of the 12 Swiss universities are maintained at the cantonal level?
When was the first university in Switzerland founded?
What is the biggest university in Switzerland?
How many students attend the University of Zurich?

context: There are <a0_0>12<a0_0/> universities in Switzerland, <a1_0>ten<a1_0/> of which are maintained at cantonal level and usually offer a range of non-technical subjects. The first university in Switzerland was founded in <a2_0>1460<a2_0/> in Basel (with a faculty of medicine) and has a tradition of chemical and medical research in Switzerland. The biggest university in Switzerland is the <a3_0>University of Zurich<a3_0/> with <a4_0>nearly 25,000<a4_0/> students. The two institutes sponsored by the federal government are the ETHZ in Zürich (founded 1855) and the EPFL in Lausanne (founded 1969 as such, formerly an institute associated with the University of Lausanne) which both have an excellent international reputation.[note 10]
